thread.title: Committee Saddened By Loss of Babies at Bongani Hospital (Parliament of South Africa)
thread.title_full: Committee Saddened By Loss of Babies at Bongani Hospital (Parliament of South Africa) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Committee Saddened By Loss of Babies at Bongani Hospital (Parliament of South Africa)
text: ( Source : Parliament of South Africa ) Parliament , Sunday, 18 October 2015 - The Chairperson for the Portfolio Committee on Health Ms Lindelwa Dunjwa would like to express her condolences to the families that have lost six babies. Media
